flawed_nl_solution:
The area of the largest room is 45 ft x 30 ft = <<45*30=1305>>1305 sq ft
The area of the smallest room is 15 ft x 8 ft = <<15*8=120>>120 sq ft
The difference between the two is 1305 sq ft - 120 sq ft = <<1305-120=1185>>1185 sq ft
#### 1185

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1350, not 1305. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
